article.title: Boston U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Boston U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Massachusetts U.S. Export Assistance Center
55 New Sudbury Street, Suite 1826A
Boston, MA 02203		Phone: 617-565-4301
Fax: 617-565-4313


Massachusetts Export Assistance Center Territory Map


Name & Title

Regions & Industries*

Email & Phone

James Paul
USEAC Director		Boston and Surrounding Cities
Education		JPaul@trade.gov
(617) 565-4304
Geoffrey Parish
ForeignCommercial
Officer		Has worked overseas with USFCS in Thailand.Geoffrey.Parish@trade.gov
(617) 565-4308
Michelle Ouellette
Senior International
Trade Specialist		North Shore
Healthcare Technologies,
Renewable Energy		Michelle.Ouellette@trade.gov
(617) 565-4302
Maryanne Burke
Senior International
Trade Specialist		South Shore and the Cape
Marine Technologies,
Travel & Tourism		Maryanne.Burke@trade.gov
(617) 565-4303
John Joyce
Small Business
Administration Export
Finance Manager		All New England StatesJohn.Joyce@trade.gov
(617) 565-4305

*Please Note: if you do not see your industry sector listed, pleasedefer to regional coverage.

Trade Information Center​

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723)

The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with the Boston office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am – 6:00 pm Eastern Time.
